summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Electric Shaver for Men, SOOCAS Mens Electric Razor, Wet & Dry IPX7 Waterproof Rotary Facial Shaver, Portable Face Shaver Cordless Travel USB Rechargeable for Husband Dad, Black Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: SOOCAS Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Special Feature': 'Portable,Rechargeable,Cordless,Waterproof,Compact', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 4.21 x 2.68 inches; 11.18 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'} Review Text: i'm surprise about the quality of this shaver, for most part it cuts really well and smooth.
the design is compact and not that heavy on hand, the battery last quite long, and i like the USB-C charging so i can use 1 charging for all. the battery last long enough.
over all this shaver is affordable and great purchase Review Title: Good inexpensive shaver Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Reusable Makeup Remover Pads| Dual- Texture Soft Reusable Face Microfiber Rounds For Mascara, Eye Shadow, Lipstick, Foundation (3 Pads+ Makeup Headband +Laundry Bag) Review Date: 2020/10/01 Store: TECHEALTH Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '11 x 7.5 x 2 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002480299'} Review Text: The pads really soft and there's another side textured pads for "physical exfoliation" skin. It really removes all the makeup. Review Title: really works removing makeup and have duo sides. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Review Date: 2020/10/27 Store: Kneipp Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} Review Text: I really enjoyed this soap. The scent is so good, its so practical change from gel to foam. I guess I used it too much for the first time, I only need 1 pump and spread it with loofah and that's enough for the whole body. Review Title: The scent is so good, really practical change from gel to foam. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 24K Gold Under Eye Mask– 20 Pairs- Under Eye Patches with Face Massager Roller, Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid Collagen Eye Masks for Dark Circles and Puffiness Dark Under Eyes Treatment Review Date: 2020/11/06 Store: FRLEDM Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FRLEDM', 'Special Feature': 'Anti Aging', 'Unit Count': '21.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '40', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 7 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)'} Review Text: I don't really interested in face roller but I feel the eye masks really worth it and decrease puffiness. Especially after put it in the fridge. Review Title: Eye masks really worth it, face roller not so much. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Avajar Whitening A-Solution Mask 10 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks | Moisturizing Face Mask| Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack Review Date: 2021/02/24 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Skin Whitening', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.28 x 1.57 x 6.89 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: After I took off the mask 20 mins, skin really bright, soft, and moisturizing! It is sticky though so I have to rinse it with water and put night cream after. But it's so worth it. Review Title: Really brightening and moisturizing. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: WIS Acne Skin Pleiotropic Conditioning Face Mask Acne Scar Remover & zit Treatment & Blemish Fightting & Reduce Pores | Organic Mask Care Acne Prone skin-24 Pcs Review Date: 2021/03/05 Store: +WIS+ Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': '+WIS+', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.07 x 4.61 x 3.66 inches; 1.83 Pounds'} Review Text: So far, it doesn't make me breakout. Review Title: Moisturizing yet powerful ingredients for acne prone skin. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NeoCell Overnighter Collagen, 9.3oz Review Date: 2021/04/10 Store: NeoCell Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NeoCell', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin c,zinc', 'Unit Count': '9.3 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.55 x 5.08 x 3.46 inches; 9.3 Ounces', 'UPC': '016185130623'} Review Text: I have been taking this for 2 weeks nightly now and I can tell the difference in my skin and hair feeling softer. I have sores on my arm and they have been healing faster.My skin feel smoother and less breakouts and my fingernails are starting to lose the ridges on them and look so much stronger. For the restful sleep benefit, I didn't feel any difference as I don't have sleep problem. Review Title: One hour before bedtime ritual drink. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Plant Therapy Natural Acetone Free Nail Polish Remover 6 fl oz One Touch Dispensing Bottle with Flip Top Cap Tropical Flower Scent Review Date: 2021/04/23 Store: Plant Therapy Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Plant Therapy', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '6.24 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2.2 x 2.2 inches; 6.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912056168'} Review Text: Smell less chemical and the polish easy to remove. Review Title: Smell less chemical and the polish easy to remove. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Night Cream Multi-Performance snow white face creme 50g Anti-drying facial moisturizer Daily Use Sun protection Skin tender Eliminate horny fast absorbing Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: OJPLAND Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'OJPLAND', 'Item Form': 'Cream,Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7637 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '4.33 x 3.5 x 2.72 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: Just for the first time I used it, its a little bit sting on my face. But after that its okay. Review Title: Good night cream, no sticky. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/06/07 Store: Shakira Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Shakira', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Dance', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.05 x 5.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8411061823033'} Review Text: Smells sweet and divine...sexy scents, and long lasting. Review Title: Smells good and long lasting. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TINY BUDDHA Mindfulness Gift Set Includes Soothing Bath and Shower Gel, Relaxing Pillow Spray, Calming Essential Oil Roll-On, Lychee Flower Scented Candle and Daily Mindfulness Practice Guide Review Date: 2021/06/15 Store: Tiny Buddha Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Tiny Buddha', 'Special Feature': 'Scented', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 8.07 x 2.52 inches; 1.45 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'KMI Brands'} Review Text: Awesome for relaxing, fell sleep faster. Review Title: Love all this set. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JOYPAWS Pet Self Cleaning Slicker Brush Grooming Brush- Shedding Tools with Flea Comb for Dogs Cats Removes Mats, Tangles, and Loose Hair(L) Review Date: 2021/06/15 Store: JOYPAWS Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JOYPAWS', 'Special Feature': 'Self Cleaning', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Material': 'stainless steel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 4.7 x 3 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'KUDI2020'} Review Text: Catch all the shedding fur. Review Title: Great grooming brush, working great. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Polish Due nails | Stretchable Real Nail Polish Strips| Gloss Solid Color, Ombre , French, Pattern, Glitter Finish 16Pcs | Inlcudes Nail Wipe, Nail File, Instructional Brochure 16Pcs( (Modern Royalty) Review Date: 2021/06/17 Store: POLISHDUE Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'POLISHDUE', 'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.66 x 2.84 x 0.16 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: Love it! Just peel,stick, and polish the excess and voila..nails done! It last long too for 2 weeks. Review Title: Great and practical Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sand & Sky Face Roller & Massager Tool. Aussie Skincare Essentials Firming Face Roller, Sculpt, Sooth & Contour to Banish Puffiness and Boost Serum Absorption. Review Date: 2021/06/26 Store: Sand & Sky Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 6.46 x 2.95 inches; 9.35 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Sand & Sky'} Review Text: Smooth roller, cooling and soothing the skin. Review Title: Smooth roller, cooling and soothing the skin. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2 Pack Foundation Full Coverage Liquid Foundation, Foundation Primer, 4 Makeup Sponge, Cosmetic Bag, 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer Foundation (Nude #102+Buff Beige #104) Review Date: 2021/07/11 Store: Onkessy Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Color': 'Beige', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup Sponge', 'Product Dimensions': '7.48 x 0.79 x 5.51 inches; 8.47 Ounces'} Review Text: Its cover my imperfection, matte and shiny free, long lasting foundation with no looking cakey and cracked. Review Title: I'm phoera fan now! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Review Title: I'm phoera fan now! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase behavior reveals strong preferences for effective and practical beauty and grooming products, with consistent patterns indicating a focus on quality. The individual rates items favorably when they deliver promised performance, particularly in terms of skin benefits, such as hydration, anti-aging, and blemish reduction. There is a clear inclination towards multi-functional items, such as reusable makeup remover pads and versatile skincare masks.

This person shows a preference for affordable, value-driven purchases without compromising on quality. The consistent use of terms like "affordable," "great purchase," and high satisfaction ratings highlights a low price sensitivity when quality is met, suggesting an appreciation for good deals. 

The sentiment around waterproof and portable features also indicates a lifestyle-oriented mindset, valuing convenience. Scented products, especially those for relaxation or therapy, are recurring themes, pointing to a mindful approach to personal care. 

Overall, the core preferences center on seeking practical, effective, and sensorial experiences in beauty and grooming while maintaining affordability and solid quality. There is a balance between experimenting with new products and returning to favorites that demonstrate clear efficacy.

target_interaction.title: Feels some heat but not hurting
target_interaction.text: the package came in set of 2, using it before jogging and exercise in the morning even without those exercise i feel some heat from the gel but still at the point that it doesnt feel uncomfortable after finished 1 tube i feel some difference for the price its worth it to get another one
target_interaction.title_meta: Hot Cream 2 Pack, Belly Fat Burner Sweat Cream for Women and Men, Fat Burning Slimming Cream, Slim Weight Loss Cream, Anti-Cellulite Massage Cream for Body Shaping Waist, Abdomen and Buttocks
features: 【Amazing Fat Burning Cream】-Our hot sweat cream helps achieve a flat belly, a sculptural figure free or stretch marks and accumulating grease & it also reduces the appearance of cellulite, penetrates the pores eliminating excess fatty tissue.

【Easy Absorbed Natural Ingredients】-Our weight loss cream is made with no chemicals just natural ingredients include antioxidants & Vitamin E A D for sensitive skin. Our formula ensures your body to burn fat while limiting cellulite & strengthening skin for a youthful appearance.

【SHAPE PERFECT BODY】-Our slim cream is hydrating, moisturizing, and easy to be absorbed by skin. It has great effect on slimming waist, legs, arms and firming abdomen. Nourishing skin to make it smooth and tender. Moreover, it helps to shape nice and attractive body.

【Rich Texture】-Ideal for extremely dry, rough, bumpy skin. opens skin pores for improved circulation, targets sweat glands to, increase perspiration, accelerates warm-up and recovery time.Accelerate blood circulation, promote the body's metabolic function, enhance muscle and promote good health.Improve cellulite to make skin smooth and delicate.

【Caution】-Although rare, burning or irritation may occur. Test a small amount on skin first. If uncomfortable or causes irritation, please discontinue use. Only apply onto intact skin. Wash hands after use. Keep out of reach of children and pets
